title: Interpretation of seeing a witch or a magician in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a witch in a dream or dream through the vision website roy2a.com. Seeing a witch in a dream has many connotations. Seeing it can be a good sign or an evil omen. Interpreters differed in the interpretation of seeing a witch in a dream according to the dreamer’s condition and circumstances, and what if the man or woman was single, married, or pregnant. Today, through the Roya website, we will discuss the interpretation of seeing a witch in a dream in detail, based on the opinion of major interpreters such as Ibn Sirin, Ibn Katheer, Al-Nabulsi, and Imam The truthful one, so follow us. What is Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing a witch in a dream? Seeing a magician in a dream refers to the priest’s fantasies and his attachment to superstitions. Seeing a witch in a dream may also indicate the presence of people conspiring against the dreamer, and this vision is considered a warning for her to be careful. Seeing a witch in a dream appears to be He will face a lot of evil in his life. The dreamer sees that he has become a magician in a dream. It shows that he will gain great importance and status. The dreamer sees that he is pleased to see a magician in a dream. It shows that he will take a wrong path in his life. Seeing people doing magic in a dream indicates the righteousness of the dreamer in all Its conditions. Seeing the dreamer muttering in the dialect of witches in a dream shows that he will go through a difficult period full of crises and problems. See also: Written prayer for the magician. Interpretation of seeing a witch in a dream for a single woman? Seeing a single witch in a dream shows her inability to achieve what she wants in life. Seeing isolated people performing magic In a dream, it appears that she will get married soon and her life will be full of happiness and joy. What is the interpretation of seeing a witch in a dream for a married woman? Seeing a married witch in a dream indicates that she is going through a period of problems with her husband that may lead to divorce. Seeing a married woman performing magic in a dream announces that she will live a life full of happiness and stability. With her husband and children. See also: Interpretation of seeing six women in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing a witch in a dream for a pregnant woman? Seeing a pregnant witch in a dream indicates a feeling of fear controlled by the birth process. Seeing a pregnant witch in a dream says that there are many evil people around her in her life, But the opposite appears to her. What is the interpretation of seeing a bewitched person in a dream? Seeing a bewitched person in a dream indicates that the dreamer always seeks to fulfill his desires and abandons the path of God. Seeing the dreamer bewitched in a dream indicates that he is a person who has many bad qualities and always follows bad friends. Seeing a bewitched person in a dream indicates turning away from God and doing many bad things. See also: Interpretation of seeing a farewell or cup reader in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing a witch chasing me in a dream? The dreamer seeing that a witch is chasing him and wants to harm him in a dream shows that he will face a disaster in the future. Nearby. Seeing a witch being chased by a familiar person running away from him in a dream shows that the dreamer is on the right path. The dreamer saw that the witch was chasing him and caught him in the dream. It indicates that there is an evil person in his life who is trying to get into him. The dreamer sees that the witch threw him into

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a bedroom in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a room in a dream, which is a square area in all homes, including the bedroom, living room, living room, children’s room, reception room, etc., but when he sees it in a dream, the dreamer becomes and has a question about the meaning of the vision, and the vision carries different meanings that we present to the leading scholars in men. And women. Interpretation of a dream about a room in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Sheikh Ibn Shirin confirmed that seeing rooms in a dream is evidence of stability and security. He also said that a good-looking student can succeed and excel. And a person in general can achieve what he wants. A singles’ bedroom indicates marriage soon. Interpretation of a dream about a room for a single woman. Spacious and elegant rooms in a dream represent the fulfillment of desires. The presence of a stranger in one room in a dream indicates good luck. The bedroom symbolizes marriage. Interpretation of a dream about a room For a married woman: Rooms in a marital dream are a sign of psychological and familial stability with the husband. A new room indicates living on a large scale. An old room conjures memories and the past. An equipped room shows good luck. Interpretation of a dream about a room for a pregnant woman When a pregnant woman dreams of seeing a spacious and beautiful room, this heralds With an easy birth. Seeing an arranged room symbolizes balance and life. Seeing a pink room means the birth of a female. If its color is dark, this indicates a male child. Interpretation of a dream about a room for a divorced woman. If a divorced woman sees herself entering the bedroom, this indicates happy days in her life. If a divorced woman sees in a dream that she is about to enter an unknown bedroom and its owner is unknown, this indicates the good that the woman will soon receive. Interpretation of a dream about a room for a man If a man sees in a dream that he sees the bedroom as if he is seeing it for the first time, this indicates The scope of his livelihood and the power he has obtained. Seeing a bedroom in a man’s dream is a sign of something in that man’s life that needs to be ended. Interpretation of dreams of entering the bedroom of someone I know. Ibn Sirin says: Seeing a house in a dream is one of the fears of visions for me, because it indicates death. Or the grave in which a person will be buried after his death. If the dreamer enters a friend’s house and this house is new, then this vision confirms that God will grant the owner of the house that the dreamer entered in his dreams. The sick dreamer dreamed that he visited his friend who died from God in a new house. . This vision confirms that the dreamer will die and die soon. To see a dreamer visiting someone he really knows means that this person is reaping the benefits of insight because this vision confirms that the dreamer will truly take responsibility for this person. Meaning of seeing an old bedroom in a dream Seeing an old room symbolizes Nostalgia. If the room has old furniture, this is an indication of negative opinion thinking.

title: Interpretation of a vision of a divorced woman returning to her husband in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a divorced woman returning to her husband in a dream indicates many positive things and praiseworthy events that the dreamer will witness in the coming period, as the return of a divorced woman to her husband means that the feelings are still alive in her heart and expresses a new opportunity to start another happy life. Rebuilding a home and family that were almost destroyed, but if the divorced woman cries or screams during the return, this is another interpretation. Interpretation of seeing a divorced woman returning to her husband in a dream. Most imams of interpretation agree that this dream is one of the praiseworthy dreams that come with good interpretations, such as forgetting the past with all its painful memories and situations. And start taking firm steps towards achieving a future full of successes and privileges. Since the dream often expresses an important event that will bring about major changes in the dreamer’s life, these changes may or may not be for the better. As for the divorced woman returning to her husband while crying, this means That both parties want to return, but there are many psychological obstacles between them or personal issues related to dignity and feelings, they need to overcome these obstacles and be happy together. In eternal happiness. This dream also expresses the dreamer’s reconciliation with life and the return of the passion and vitality that beats in her heart again after a period of inactivity and despair, perhaps due to injury or failure to achieve some personal goals. Interpretation of seeing a divorced woman returning to her husband in a dream according to Ibn Sirin, according to the opinion of the Sheikh The great Ibn Shirin, the return of the divorced woman to her husband means that both parties have a strong affection and relationship that carries happy memories that lasted for a long time. The dream also indicates the end of the dispute and problems between the dreamer and her family, after a period of boycotts and disagreements that led to poor relations between them. The dream also indicates that The dreamer achieved old goals that he was desperate to achieve and thought about impossible paths, but he will return them now and be able to develop them and achieve high profits and large profits from them.Interpretation of a dream about peace with divorceesMost interpreters agree that this dream is a reflection of reality, as it indicates the mother’s return to her husband and their overcoming On that bad stage of disagreements and problems that they saw recently. Some opinions believe that this dream means that one of the parties feels remorse for the other party’s wrongdoing and injustice, which was the reason for the separation between them and regret later. The dream also reflects the return of joy and comfort to the dreamer after a difficult period that he recently went through. Some people believe that this dream means that the dreamer is forced to do things and things that she does not want, which makes her want to find other ways to live away from the domineering side that controls her. The vision also expresses the dreamer’s sadness and her entering a stage of isolation from the world around her, perhaps because she experienced a strong shock that made her hesitant to enter into new relationships. As for the woman who refuses to return to her ex-husband while he is at home, this means that her ex-husband does not see her.

title: Interpretation of seeing a living person die and then come back to life

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a living person die and then return to lifeDeath is defined as the separation of a living being from life, and according to heavenly religions, death is a transition from this earthly life to the afterlife, and we will explain to you the dream of death and its interpretation while we talk about the interpretation of seeing a living person die and then return to life What is the interpretation of seeing a living person die and then return to life? The interpretation of seeing a living person die and then return to life indicates the dreamer’s good condition and that God will grant him a lot of money and goodness. When a person sees that his mother has returned to life after death, this The vision shows the relief of the person who sees it after worry, fatigue, and anxiety. A man seeing in a dream that his wife has returned to life, this vision indicates the poverty that will exist in this man. A girl dreamed in her dream that her dead brother had returned to life, the dream was evidence of the return A person who is absent from her travels. When the dreamer sees that his dead daughter has come back to life, this dream indicates the goodness and joy that will come to this person in the coming days. If the dreamer sees in his dream that his deceased friend has come back to life, this means that he will hear a lot Of the good news in the coming days. A man dreamed in a dream that his brother had returned to life. His vision was indicative of strength. Interpretation of seeing a living person die and then return to life for one girl. If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she has died, her vision indicates that this girl She will get married soon. An unmarried girl dreams in a dream that her dead uncle has returned to life. This vision indicates his high status and that he will obtain high positions in society. An unmarried girl dreams of her deceased father returning to life again, and this indicates the happy and good fortune that she will have. By the girl, the vision also shows her good condition and success in her life. When an unmarried girl sees that a dead person she knows has come back to life again and was eating food, this vision showed many good things that she will receive in the coming days. If an unmarried girl sees In her dream that the dead person she loves has returned to life, the dream indicates a long life for this dreaming girl. However, if an unmarried girl sees that an unknown person died and came back to life, this indicates that she will receive an inheritance that will be distributed among some people. An unmarried girl sees In her dream, her dead mother returns to life. This dream indicates goodness and happiness that will come to the girl, or it may be a sign of her marriage soon. Interpretation: A person dies and then comes back to life for a married woman. When a married woman sees in her dream the death of a dead person she knows again, but without... A funeral home or funeral, this vision was evidence that she would repair the house in which this woman lived or that she would move to another new place. Interpretation of seeing a living person die and then return to life, and a married woman seeing in her dream the dead person returning to life, his vision was evidence of Goodness, blessing and benefit

title: Interpretation of a dream about ants on the body of a married woman

preview.html: In the following lines, we will learn with you about the general meaning of seeing ants on the body through your website gptafser.com/, so stay with us. Interpretation of seeing ants on the body in a dream for a single girl. Seeing ants on the body of an unmarried woman in a dream is one of the bad dreams in which there is no good and indicates bad. Luck, illness, and anxiety. And whoever sees ants walking on her hair and piercing her locks, there are those who incite her to immorality and disobedience. See also: Seeing ants in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of seeing ants on the body in a dream for a married woman. When a married woman sees ants on her body, she will go through a harsh experience and illness. The emergence of ants from his mouth in a dream is false testimony, and God knows best. The emergence of ants from the eye in a dream is evidence that the dreamer is stealing the eye and eavesdropping on the private lives of others. The interpretation of seeing ants on the body in a man’s dream and its meaning. Seeing ants on the patient’s body in a dream is death and its end is yes, and God knows best. Whoever covers his body with ants in a dream dies from disobedience. If a person sees in his dream that ants cover his hands, then he is a lazy and dependent person. The ants cover his legs with complete paralysis. The meaning of seeing ants on the body in a pregnant woman’s dream and its interpretation. The pregnant woman, if she sees ants on her body in a dream, then she is not She is fine and the health of her fetus is unstable, and God knows best. Ants in a pregnant woman’s dream represent the failure of her birth and the instability of her pregnancy. Seeing ants in sugar is evidence of its loss of credibility among people. Read also: Interpretation of seeing ants on the wall in a dream. Interpretation of seeing ants on the body in a dream for young people and its meaning. He says Interpretation scholars say that seeing ants on a naked body in a young man’s dream is a sign of immorality and immorality for the dreamer, and God knows best. When he sees a young man sleeping, it is as if there are ants on his head. This is evidence of his many tasks and duties, and in return he falls short and is late in performing his work. Interpretation of a dream about ants on the body In the dream of a divorced woman. Interpretation of a dream about ants on the body of a divorced woman. Its interpretation is life’s problems and suffering. If the ants cover her entire body, then she is drowning in anxiety and sorrows. The emergence of ants from different parts of the body in a dream indicates illness and death. If the dreamer is pleased with the emergence of ants, then it is a good ending, and God bless her. I know. The interpretation of seeing ants in the house by Ibn Sirin. Seeing ants in the house, if no damage occurs, indicates the large number of members of the house and the relationship and affection between them. Also, seeing ants coming out of the house in a dream indicates that the thieves escaped after looting the house, and God knows best. Seeing ants coming out of the house in a dream indicates that the thieves escaped after looting the house, and God knows best. From a hole in the wall in a dream indicates sadness, anguish, distress, troubles, and debts. Seeing ants carrying their food and bringing it back to the house is good news of relief, the coming of food, and an abundance of goodness, God willing. You may be interested: Interpretation of dreams for ants in the houseSeeing a lot of ants in a dream is considered a vision A lot of ants in the bed is a sign of an increase in offspring, a multiplication of offspring, and an expansion of nutrition. As for seeing large numbers of black ants in a dream, it indicates the gathering of soldiers and infantry for battle. It is said that a large number of red ants in a dream is evidence of the spread of diseases and epidemics, and God knows best.

title: Interpretation of a dream about carpets in a dream for a married woman and various occasions, good and bad

preview.html: Many people wonder to see the interpretation of the carpet in a dream for a married woman and the different cases in good and evil, which indicates what is indicated and what is the correct interpretation of seeing it for a married woman? This is our topic today that we will explain to you and we will explain it as Ibn Sirin explained it to us, and there are many different opinions among the interpreters, but we try to provide you with the clearest interpretation. Therefore, follow us in this article in the Encyclopedia to learn together about the interpretation of seeing a carpet in a dream for a married woman. Carpets in a dream for Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin explained to us that the carpet in a dream is evidence of comfort and comfort, and indicates an abundance of sustenance and longevity as well, his travels and his life. He also explained to us that whoever dreams that he is walking on the carpet, God Almighty will protect him from poverty, illness and distress. And whoever sees that he is buying a carpet, this indicates that he will buy a piece of land, or a house, or other. As for whoever thinks that he is spreading the carpet in any place, the interpretation of that is that he will have a place among the people of that place and his people, and it was also said: It indicates the extent of that person's simplicity. And that God will increase his food and his land. For whoever sees that the carpets are spread before them, this indicates the extent of sustenance and longevity, and it is a great good for him in his family and his money. Whoever sees that they are placing the carpets in a distant and strange place unknown to them, this is interpreted as them going to a foreign country and escaping, but they will gain the approval and love of others and have a place in the world. As for those who dream that they are folding carpets, the interpretation of this is that they will fold the earth on a journey in search of livelihood and work. As for seeing the ruler or one of the leaders in seeing his carpet folded, this is interpreted as he will run out of his rule and money and maintain his worldly affairs. It is also far from seeing the carpet burning or burning previously in a dream, as Ibn Sirin explained to us that this indicates the narrowness of the world for the one who saw the dream, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Carpets in a dream, Abdul Ghani Al-Nabulsi’s interpretation does not differ much from Ibn Sirin’s interpretation, as it has become clear that carpets in a dream are good and praiseworthy. And whoever sees in a dream that he is walking on carpets or standing alone and spreading them, the earth will extend in front of him, and food and great ability will come to him. Carpets in dreams in general are worldly and the life of the seer. As for whoever sees in his dream that he sees the carpet placed in front of him, but in a place other than his place and other than his family, this is good and shows that he will marry a woman who is not from his family or clan. As for the rulers and princes, if they see in a dream the most important people who Wearing carpets, it is a good, spacious, noble and excellent position. But if he folds the carpet and raises it on his shoulders, the size of his life will be turned upside down and he may lose everything he has and his rule may end. Abdul Ghani Al-Nabulsi also hated to see burning carpets in a dream, as this is not good, and God Almighty knows best. Interpretation of carpets in a dream for a married woman Seeing carpets for a married woman in a dream shows joy, happiness and pleasure that fills the house and also symbolizes that the dreamer earns a lawful livelihood and comfort in her life. The interpretation varies

title: Interpretation of counting banknotes in a dream by Ibn Sirin, counting green banknotes in a dream and interpretation of a dream about counting blue banknotes in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of counting banknotes in a dream: Learn about the interpretation of counting torn money in a dream, the interpretation of counting new money in a dream, and what are the most clear indications that have been said about seeing counting green and blue money? Follow the following paragraphs. Everything you are looking for to know the interpretation of counting banknotes in a dream. A dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of counting banknotes in a dream. Interpretation of a dream of counting banknotes indicates multiple crises in the dreamer’s life, especially if the money he counts is a lot. Counting new banknotes in a dream is evidence of happiness and abundant living, and it is preferable for the money that the dreamer saw in the dream to be a number. is known, so that the previous interpretation is correct. If the dreamer sees a lot of money and counts it while he is upset in the dream, the scene confirms that the dreamer will face a bad situation or a problem in his life that will cause him fear, anxiety, and instability. As one of the jurists said, counting money is interpreted according to It is confusion and lack of stability in a decision or position, and there is no doubt that confusion, if it exceeds its limit, becomes a major cause of loss. If the dreamer sees paper money consisting of banknotes of five, ten, and twenty denominations, and when he counts them, he finds one hundred pounds, then the vision is promising and symbolizes the achievement of The goal and achieving prosperity and great success in life. However, if the fortuneteller counted the banknotes he saw in a dream and found that they were two hundred pounds, this indicates the death of two family members or family members. Interpretation of counting banknotes in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Money in a dream by Ibn Sirin may indicate livelihood. Or indicates problems and sadness. And he gets a lot of money and a lot of goodness. If the dreamer faces many problems in reality and sees that he was counting banknotes in a dream and was surprised that their number was insufficient, then this is interpreted as a decrease in the number of problems he faces in reality, and relief may come. For him, God willing. But if the dreamer faces many crises and problems in reality and sees that he is counting a lot of money in a dream, then the vision shows the multiplication of crises and burdens that the dreamer carries on his shoulders while he is awake. Do you have a confused dream? what are you waiting for; Google website Interpretation of dreams in Egypt Interpretation of counting banknotes in a dream for a single woman If an unmarried woman sees that she is unable to count the bills she saw in a dream, this indicates her failure to bear responsibility in reality. And if an unmarried woman sees in her dream a lot of money and she is counting it, then this It indicates her bad luck, as she is rebelling against God’s rule and destiny and is not satisfied with what he has distributed to her. If an unmarried woman sees that she is sitting with her fiancé and there is a huge sum of money between them and they plowed it in the dream, then the scene shows the failure of their marriage due to the many disagreements that bring them together. Time. If an unmarried woman sees in her dream a bunch of pounds and papers, and when she counts them, she finds eight pounds, then the interpreters said that the number eight in a virgin’s dream indicates deception, livelihood, health, and concealment. But if the dreamer counts the

title: The most prominent 50 interpretations of a dream about many cats by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about many catsInterpretation of a dream about many cats can express good or bad, as there are those who actually fear cats and do not like to touch them, and there are those who look at them closely as pets that people raise in their homes without fear, so we find that bringing them Sight has different interpretations depending on the details that a person sees during his sleep. What is the interpretation of a dream of many cats? The interpretation of a dream of many cats in a dream can be interpreted in many situations, depending on the different social status of the viewer or the body in which they appear. Seeing many cats in a dream It means that there are many people around the dreamer who show him wrong feelings and eventually deceive him. The girl who sees these many cats next to her and looks innocent and calm is a sign of the presence of a friend who does not love her and wishes her harm, while the rest of her friends are loyal and trying to guide her. To avoid this friend, but she does not listen to their advice and does not believe what was said about her friend. It is also said that a man who sees many cats shows that he is playing with the feelings of many girls. The calm that the cats show in the fortune teller’s room indicates the happiness he experiences and the absence of problems in his life. As for If many cats are in a state of quarrels and riots before the viewer’s eyes, this is a sign of instability in his family life and many quarrels that occur between him and some of his family members. What is the interpretation of a dream about many cats by Ibn Sirin? Said Ibn Sirin, the most famous scholar in Interpretation of visions and dreams: A cat in a dream indicates happiness in life, especially in the dream of a man who is looking for a good wife and at the same time has a high rank. Beauty. If the dreamer finds more than one cat in his dream, this means that he has multiple relationships with women, especially if he is still single. As for the married man, there are problems in his life that arise from the women he had a relationship with in the past, and they return to his life with a desire In taking revenge on him. If a girl sees a cat in her dream, this indicates the presence of a young man who is trying to approach her and tempt her with sweet words, and in the end he wants to deceive her and exploit her feelings to his advantage. And control her without having to marry her. But if the dreamer is afraid of the group of cats that he saw standing in front of his house and preventing him from leaving, then this is a sign of anxiety within him and a lack of self-confidence, which makes all his future plans. He is upset, and cannot achieve his dreams, and if there is a girl he wants to marry, he will marry someone else, because it is too late to make the decision to propose to her. Small kittens in a dream are a praiseworthy vision, while big cats indicate deception and evasion that characterize many People around the fortuneteller. What is the interpretation of a dream about many single cats? Interpretation of a dream about many cats for a single woman. Seeing many cats in a dream for single people means that they are very social and do not like isolation or feeling lonely, but at the same time they are not good at treating others in their own way and they have their own ways. Which can do

title: Interpretation of a dream about someone I love holding my hand for a single woman

preview.html: In the following lines presented by gptafser.com/, we will talk in detail about many of the interpretive cases related to seeing someone holding my hand in a dream, so follow us. Interpretation of a dream about someone I love holding my hand for a single woman. If a girl sees the person she loves holding her hand in a dream, this is just Feelings and desires stemming from her love for that person. When a girl dreams of her lover holding her hand against her will, this prompts her to commit immoral acts out of love. And whoever holds her lover’s hand, she must restrain her emotions and rush towards that person so as not to misjudge her. When a girl sees in her dream That her fiancé holds her hand, because he cares about her interests and always pushes her forward. It is also said: If the suitor holds his fiancée’s hand in a dream and stays for a long time, it is good news of their imminent marriage, and God knows best. And whoever sees her lover in a dream kissing her hands, he will ask forgiveness for what he did to her, and God knows best. If a girl sees in a dream that her father is forcefully pulling her hand, then if she feels pain, the father will force her to do something against her will. And whoever sees in a dream a stranger violently grabbing her hand, this is a sign that he is facing many problems and crises. See also: Interpretation of dreams about someone he loves holding In your hand, for singles, married people, and men. Interpretation of seeing someone holding my hand in a dream about a married woman. If a married woman sees in her dream that her husband is holding her hand, then there is a great bond and harmony between them and that their marital relationship is full of affection and stability. And whoever holds the hand of strangers in a dream, this is a righteous woman who pleases her family and does good deeds. It helps the needy and the poor. When a married woman sees her ex-lover holding her hands in a dream, she misses affection, attention, and nostalgia for past memories. If a woman holds her husband’s hand tightly in a dream, both of them will face some difficult circumstances and financial crises, and God knows best. And who holds the hand of an unknown person in the dream? In a dream, he finds it cut or with a wound, then she may be divorced from her husband against her will, and God knows best. Seeing an unknown person holding the hand of a married woman in a dream indicates that the dreamer is a cooperative person and provides assistance to everyone as much as he can. If a woman dreams of her friend or sister and she Holding her hand tightly, this means that the friend is in great distress and needs someone to stand by her side. Seeing a small child holding the hand of a married woman in a dream is good news, abundant livelihood and happy news, and she may become pregnant soon. Interpretation of seeing someone holding my hand in a dream about A man and its meaningWhen a man sees in a dream that an unknown woman is holding his hand, he is looking for love and affection and does not feel the attention of his wife as he did in the past. If a man sees his ex-girlfriend holding his hand in a dream, he still thinks about her and longs for the past with her and always wonders if she She is still thinking about him. Seeing an unknown man holding the dreamer’s hand with great force in a dream is a sign that the dreamer will obtain great psychological peace and a clear conscience. And whoever sees an acquaintance holding his hand in a dream, it is a sign of the completion of traps.

title: Interpretation of seeing bananas in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi

preview.html: Seeing bananas in a dream. Many of those who see bananas in their dreams wonder about the interpretation of bananas in a dream. They are one of the most important and delicious fruits in food, and they are preferred by many people who like to eat fruit. Interpretation of seeing bananas in a dream. Seeing bananas in a dream. The site will provide us with many different interpretations in detail. This is the group of these interpretations: Eating bananas in a dream is a great indicator of the dreamer’s good condition in reality. Eating sweet, delicious bananas in a dream symbolizes good morals and that the soul longs to love and obey God. As for eating bananas with nuts, this is evidence of good news of abundant sustenance for the pioneer, which he will obtain with permission. God. As for the interpretation of eating bananas with honey, it is evidence of abundant and blessed food. As for whoever sees in a dream that he is forced to eat bananas, this means that the dreamer is forced to be courteous to many people and does not want to do so. As for the interpretation of seeing him eating salty bananas with the addition of nuts, this is It indicates the dreamer's silence and standing on the opposite side of something. If the dreamer sees in a dream that he is giving someone a banana, this indicates that he has a distinguished and fair personality. If he sees that he is giving someone a banana, this indicates that the dreamer is always present in gatherings of kindness, And his biography is only mentioned as benevolent. But if the vision is that this dreamer gives others free bananas in the dream, then this is a sign that this dreamer usually gives others advice and enjoins good and prevents evil. As for whoever sees his parents in a dream giving each of them bananas, then this It indicates justice with them. If the father or mother sees that each of them gives the children bananas, this is evidence of the dreamer’s charitable upbringing of other children. And if the dreamer sees a large, dry banana tree that is not fully ripe, then this is evidence of his abandoning the upbringing of his parents and grandparents and abandoning the good habits that He grew up with it. As for seeing black bananas or rotten bananas, this indicates the possibility that the dreamer will suffer from illness or fatigue. Read also: Interpretation of seeing live chicken in a dream in detail. Ibn Sirin’s opinion on the interpretation of seeing suffering waz in a dream. One of Ibn Sirin’s oldest interpretations of seeing bananas in A dream that this dream is a sign of goodness, and that it is a praiseworthy vision according to the different interpretation of each person according to the order of the vision. Also, a banana in a dream always indicates good morals. The banana fruit in a dream also indicates that the dreamer will be blessed with abundant money and abundant sustenance. You are in most Times: Seeing bananas in a dream: For a pregnant woman, there are indications that the woman may become pregnant with a man. It is also possible that a dream about bananas in a dream indicates a wealthy and wealthy person, and God knows best. Al-Nabulsi’s saying in interpreting a dream about bananas. Imam Al-Nabulsi, the great scholar, says that a dream about bananas usually indicates That the dreamer is a pious person, dedicated to worshiping God always and with piety. As for seeing bananas in a dream, this means that the dreamer gets a lot of money, whether from a cooperative, or from a large company that gives him a living, or from a private person.
